text: Nambi uli (pandema jayayichilile ilagasyo) nganiyakamuchisya ayila yaŵalitendele yangaŵaga Allah kuŵa milungu jakuliŵandichilisya Kukwakwe? Nambo yasokonechele ŵanganyao, soni walakweo (wakuitenda isanamu kuŵa milungu jakwaŵandichisya kwa Allah) ni unami wao, ni (yaukoleko) yaaŵele ŵanganyao ali nkutunga
